C

Checkerboard - Class in cip.render.raytrace.material.texture
Maps every unit square (in 2D) or cube (in 3D) into 4 unit squares (2D) or 8 unit cubes (3D) with alternating materials in the squares or cubes.
Checkerboard() - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.material.texture.Checkerboard
Creates a new instance of Checkerboard

cip.render - package cip.render
The programs and classes that support 3D modelling, animation, and rendering.
cip.render.raytrace - package cip.render.raytrace
The programs and classes specifically supporting ray traced image generation.
cip.render.raytrace.background - package cip.render.raytrace.background
These are classes supporting various backgrounds including a constant colour background and reflection mapped backgrounds.
cip.render.raytrace.camera - package cip.render.raytrace.camera
These are representations of cameras supporting ray tracing..
cip.render.raytrace.geometry - package cip.render.raytrace.geometry
These are geometries that can be used in ray-traced scenes, they are all dynamically loaded objects that can be specified in scene description file.
cip.render.raytrace.interfaces - package cip.render.raytrace.interfaces
Interfaces for cameras, lights, backgrounds, geometries, geometry groups, materials
cip.render.raytrace.light - package cip.render.raytrace.light
Implementations of light sources for ray tracing.
cip.render.raytrace.material - package cip.render.raytrace.material
These are classes supporting material models that produce the surface appearance of geometries.
cip.render.raytrace.material.D - package cip.render.raytrace.material.D
Implementations of slope distribution functions for materials.
cip.render.raytrace.material.G - package cip.render.raytrace.material.G
Implementations of geometric attenuation functions for materials.
cip.render.raytrace.material.texture - package cip.render.raytrace.material.texture
These are classes supporting various surface textures.
cip.render.util - package cip.render.util
These are generic utilities not specific to 2D or 3D geometry or rendering.
cip.render.util2d - package cip.render.util2d
These are utility classes supporting 2D modeling and geometry.
cip.render.util3d - package cip.render.util3d
These are utility classes supporting 3D modeling, geometry, and rendering.
cip.render.utilColour - package cip.render.utilColour
These are utility classes supporting colour representation and computation for rendering.
clamp() - Method in class cip.render.utilColour.RGBf
Clamps the red, green, and blue colour components to be in the range 0.0 to 1.0.

Cone - Class in cip.render.raytrace.geometry
This is an implementation of an elliptical cone whose apex is at 0,0,0 and extends infinitely along the Z axis.
Cone() - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Cone
Creates a new instance of Cone.
ConstantColour - Class in cip.render.raytrace.background
A constant colour background - the same colour in all directions.

Cross this vector with another vector, v.
CUTOFF_CONTRIBUTION - Static variable in class cip.render.raytrace.material.PackageConstants
The contribution below which continuing the ray intersection tree will be assumed to have no meaningful effect and the tree will be adaptively terminated if adaptive depth termination is supported by the illumination model.
Cylinder - Class in cip.render.raytrace.geometry
This is the implementation of a elliptical cylinder centered at 0,0,0 of infinite extend in the major axis Z.
Cylinder() - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Cylinder
Creates a new instance of Cylinder.
